name: Super Raccoon Go!
description:
Super Raccoon Go is a game made for GameBoy Color. It will run on all-known Gameboy Hardware, and emulators. It is compatible with a original DMG Gameboy & the Super GameBoy.

One raccoon, one goal – dance until you can’t dance no more. Score higher by chaining dances together, and performing unique dances. The more total unique dances you perform, the higher your score!

Each direction is a different dance, each button is a different dance (except SELECT & START). To perform move complicated dances, press a cardinal direction along with the A or B button.

That’s all there is to it. Enjoy!

Controls

  • D-Pad: Dance
  • A-Button: Dance
  • B-Button: Dance
  • SELECT + START + A + B: Reset game
